Name: fromRoleNames
Description: List of parent role names. Only child roles of these roles are loaded. Leave empty to load all roles.

Name: componentId
Description: Unique identifier of this component instance.

Name: selectedRole
Description: Holds the selected role value.

Name: excludedRolenames
Description: List of role names to exclude from selection. Only applies when using the default completeMethod.

Name: requiredMessage
Description: Validation message displayed when the required field is empty.

Name: forceSelection
Description: When enabled, only roles from the suggestion list can be selected.

Name: minQueryLength
Description: Minimum number of characters required to start searching.

Name: completeMethod
Description: Custom method for loading roles. Must accept a String query and return List<RoleDTO>.

Name: isDisabled
Description: Disables the role selection input.

Name: isRequired
Description: Marks the role selection field as required.

Name: isReadOnly
Description: Prevents changing the selected role when enabled.

Name: isRenderedMessage
Description: Controls whether validation messages are rendered.

Name: hightlight
Description: Automatically highlights the first suggested role.

Name: floatingLabel
Description: Displays the label using floating style.

Name: autocompleteStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the role autocomplete component.

Name: autoCompletePanelStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the role autocomplete dropdown panel.

Name: inputStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the role autocomplete input field.

Name: labelStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the label.

Name: appendOption
Description: Additional information appended to the role display, such as parent role name or none. Value: NONE, PARENT_NAME.

Name: label
Description: Label text for the role selection component.

Name: size
Description: Number of characters used to define the input width.

Name: messageStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the validation message.

Name: itemLabel
Description: Text displayed for roles in the dropdown and the selected value.

Name: cache
Description: Caches autocomplete search results when enabled.

Name: moreText
Description: Text displayed for the 'More' link when results exceed the limit.

Name: queryDelay
Description: Delay in milliseconds before sending the search query.

Name: maxResults
Description: Maximum number of results displayed in the dropdown.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: Maximum height of the autocomplete dropdown panel.

Name: hasCustomizedSelectionList
Description: Displays a customized selection list when enabled.

Name: isShowAvatarInSelectionList
Description:
| Displays role avatars in the selection list when enabled.
| The setting will detect Portal setting Portal.ShowAvatar as its default value, refer to HowTo: Update :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to true.

Name: displayNameRenderedInSelectionList
Description: Controls visibility of the role display name in the selection list.

Name: displayNameInSelectionListStyleClass
Description: CSS style class for the role display name in the selection list.

Name: selectionListContainerStyleClass
Description: CSS style class for the selection list item container.

Name: emptyMessage
Description: Message displayed when no results are available.
